name: Hard And Fast
description:
You are a player controlling a tank. You may be good, but the enemies are no less. They are learning from their mistakes and coming back as faster and harder. You must survive and fight, to earn more points.

W - Move to upper platform 

A - Move to left platform.

S - Move to bottom platform

D - Move to right platform

Left mouse button click - Shoots

You have 5 health bottles, and you must protect them. You lose all of them and you lose yourself.
